this_title: おこんの初恋 花嫁七変化
introduction: It's an extravaganza of song and dance when everybody's favorite, Misora Hibari, stars in this highly entertaining samurai tale from noted filmmaker Watanabe Kunio who directed "Chusingura-The Daiei Version" the very same year. The Japanese belief in the mystical powers of the fox are taken to the extreme as Okon is the 'vixen' leading a group of foxes that sometimes steal from the farmers and townspeople. (TV broadcast quality) ~Kurotokagi
chinese_title: おこんの初恋 花嫁七変化
